translations.translation: Then the fish devoured him and he was to blame.
Then he was swallowed by a large fish as he was worthy of blame.
Then a fish swallowed him, and he was blameworthy.
The fish swallowed him up and he deserved (all this).
The fish then swallowed him and he blamed himself. (For not waiting for Allah’s command.)
Then a (big) fish swallowed him as he had done an act worthy of blame.
So the fish swallowed him while he did that for which he blamed himself
then the whale swallowed him down, and he blameworthy.
And the fish swallowed him while he was blameworthy;
and the fish swallowed him while he was blaming himself.
And a fish swallowed him, and he was reproaching himself.
Then the fish swallowed him while he was blameworthy.
Then the big Fish did swallow him, and he had done acts worthy of blame.
Then a (big) fish swallowed him and he had done an act worthy of blame.
So the whale swallowed him, for he was blameworthy,
Then the fish swallowed him, and he was to blame.
Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.
[37:142] Then the whale swallowed him while he was blameworthy, that is, while he was guilty of a blameworthy thing, having gone to sea and embarked the ship without his Lord’s permission.
(And the fish swallowed him while be was blameworthy) he reproached himself for fleeing from his folk;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ } معناه أتى أمراً يُلامُ عليه
 وقال التَقمهُ الحُوتُ غدوةً ولَفَظهُ عَشيةً ويقال: لَبِثَ فِي بَطنهِ سَبعةَ أيامٍ
 ويقالُ: أربعُون يوماً

translations.translation:
And His saying, {So the whale swallowed him while he was blameworthy} [i.e., deserving of blame]. Its meaning is that he came to a matter that he would be blamed for.


And the whale said, "Tomorrow I will return," and he spoke at nightfall. And it is said that he stayed in his belly for seven days.
 It is said: Forty days

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما وصل إلى جوف الماء { فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ } بإلهام الله إياه على الفور، وابتلعه { وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ } [الصافات: 142] نفسه، نادم على فعله الذي فعله بلا نزول وحي من ربه؛ لذلك أخذ حنيئذ سبح له سبحانه عام لا يليق بشأنه

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { فالتقمه الحوتُ } فابتلعه { وهو مُلِيمٌ } داخلٌ في الملامة، أو: آتٍ بما يُلام عليه، ولم يُلَم فإذا ليم كان مألوماً
